basic.color: Flower color white green, fruit color purple

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Strong resistant to shade, put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Mix proper amount of slow-release fertilizers when planting, apply liquid fertilizers 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
